Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the flight booking system. Manages customer details and their bookings.
Author:
M9

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(int id, String name, String phone, String email)
      Constructs a Customer with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - unique customer identifier
      name - customer's full name
      phone - customer's phone number
      email - customer's email address

      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to cancel
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if booking not found
